title.@value: Autoimmune haemolytic anaemia, mixed type, cold and warm

definition.@value: Mixed autoimmune haemolytic anaemia is a type of autoimmune haemolytic anaemia (AIHA) defined by the presence of both warm and cold autoantibodies, which have a deleterious effect on red blood cells at either body temperature or at lower temperatures.

label.@value: Autoimmune haemolytic anaemia, mixed type, cold and warm
